testcase.name: 'after' hooks do not apply to called features
testcase.system-out: * def foo = 'hello' ....................................................... passed * configure afterScenario = ............................................... passed * configure afterFeature = function(){ karate.call('after-feature.feature'); } . passed * print foo ............................................................... passed * def foo = 'hello' ....................................................... passed * configure afterScenario = ............................................... passed * configure afterFeature = function(){ karate.call('after-feature.feature'); } . passed * print foo ............................................................... passed * def foo = 'hello' ....................................................... passed * configure afterScenario = ............................................... passed * configure afterFeature = function(){ karate.call('after-feature.feature'); } . passed * print foo + 1 ........................................................... passed * def foo = 'hello' ....................................................... passed * configure afterScenario = ............................................... passed * configure afterFeature = function(){ karate.call('after-feature.feature'); } . passed * print foo + 2 ........................................................... passed * def foo = 'hello' ....................................................... passed * configure afterScenario = ............................................... passed * configure afterFeature = function(){ karate.call('after-feature.feature'); } . passed * def result = call read('called.feature') ................................ passed
